summary: Shan, a mermaid, is sent to assassinate Xuan, a developer who threatens the ecosystem of her race, but ends up falling in love with him instead.
cast: Chao Deng|Show Lo|Yuqi Zhang|Yun Lin|Hark Tsui|Zhang Wen|Kris Wu|Sheung-ching Lee|Zhengyu Lu|Chi Ling Chiu|Mei'e Zhang|Linah Matsuoka|Barbie Liu|Zhen Zhen Xu|Bai-Ke|Lianshun Kong|Wilson Chin|Tze-Chung Lam|Jifeng Zheng|Shuzhen Fan|Ivan Kotik|Pierre Bourdaud|Neng Yang|Shuang Gao|Kate Hawkins|Fuyi Liu|Mingze Liu|Kai-Man Tin|Bo Xiaolong
title: Mei ren yu
